# Where all the options in sonic_snmp.yml that are autogenerated (the user cannot set any of the values)
options:
    config:
        description:
            - SNMP configuration
        type: dict
        suboptions:
            agentaddress:
                description:
                    - SNMP agent access configuration
                type: dict
                suboptions:
                    name:
                        description:
                            - The name of the agentaddress
                        type: str
            targets:
                description:
                - List of targets
                type: list
                elements: dict
                suboptions:
                name:
                    description:
                        - Name of the target
                    type: str
                    required: true
                udp:
                    description:
                    - UDP port
                    type: dict
                    suboptions:
                    port:
                        description:
                        - Port number
                        type: int
                tag:
                    description:
                    - List of tag values used to select target addresses
                    type: list
                    elements: str
              target_params:
                description:
                  - Target parameters
                type: str
              source_interface:
                description:
                  - Source interface IP for sending SNMP traps
                type: str
            target_params:
              description:
                - List of target parameters
              type: list
              elements: dict
              suboptions:
                name:
                  description:
                    -  Name of target parameter
                  type: str
                  required: true
                v2c:
                  description:
                    - SNMPv2c configuration
                  type: dict
                  suboptions:
                    security_name:
                      description:
                        - Security name
                      type: str
                usm:
                  description:
                    - USM configuration
                  type: dict
                  suboptions:
                    user_name:
                      description:
                        - Name of user
                      type: str
                    security_level:
                      description:
                        - The security level
                      type: str
                      choices:
                        - no-auth-no-priv
                        - auth-no-priv
                        - auth-priv
                      required: true
            communities:
              description:
                - List of communities
              type: list
              elements: dict
              suboptions:
                group:
                  description:
                    - SNMP group
                  type: list
                  elements: dict
                  suboptions:
                    security_model:
                      description:
                      - the version. Automatically set to 'v2c'
                      type: str  
            engine:
              description:
                - SNMP engine configuration
              type: dict
              suboptions:
                listen:
                  description:
                    - List of configurations for the transport endpoints on which the engine listens
                  type: list
                  elements: dict
                  suboptions:
                    name:
                      description:
                        - Name of listen entry
                      type: str
                      required: true
                    udp:
                      description:
                        - UDP configuration
                      type: dict
                      suboptions:
                        ip:
                          description:
                            - IP address on which the engine listens
                          type: str
                        port:
                          description:
                            -  UDP port number on which the engine listens, range 1024-65535
                          type: int
                        interface:
                          description:
                            - Name of interface
                          type: str
                version:
                  description:
                    - The version for the engine
                  type: dict
                  options:
                    v2c:
                      description:
                        - If v2c is enabled
                      type: bool
                    v3:
                      description:
                        - If v3 is enabled
                      type: bool
                interface_traps:
                  description:
                    - List of interface traps
                  type: list
                  elements: dict
                  suboptions:
                    ifname:
                      description:
                        - Interface name
                      type: str
                      required: true
                    trap_status:
                      description:
                        - Enable/disable traps on the interface
                      type: bool
            group:
              description:
                - SNMP group
              type: list
              elements: dict
              suboptions:
                access:
                  description:
                    - List of access rights configuration for groups
                  type: list
                  elements: dict
                  suboptions:
                    context:
                      description:
                        - Context under which access rights apply
                        - Set to 'default' as value
                      type: str
                      required: true
                    security_model:
                      description:
                        - Security model used for user authentication
                      type: str
                      required: true
